channel.title: CVE Feed for Citrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Citrix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27513|2024-08-03T05:32:59.251Z -- citrix -- citrix%20gateway%2C%20citrix%20adc
item.description: Remote desktop takeover via phishing

item.title: CVE-2022-27510|2024-08-03T05:32:59.200Z -- citrix -- citrix%20gateway%2C%20citrix%20adc
item.description: Unauthorized access to Gateway user capabilities

item.title: CVE-2022-27511|2024-08-03T05:32:59.180Z -- citrix -- citrix%20application%20delivery%20management%20%28citrix%20adm%29
item.description: Corruption of the system by a remote, unauthenticated user. The impact of this can include the reset of the administrator password at the next device reboot, allowing an attacker with ssh access to connect with the default administrator credentials after the device has rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2022-27516|2024-08-03T05:32:59.301Z -- citrix -- citrix%20gateway%2C%20citrix%20adc
item.description: User login brute force protection functionality bypass

item.title: CVE-2022-27503|2024-08-03T05:32:57.924Z -- citrix -- storefront
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Citrix StoreFront affects version 1912 before CU5 and version 3.12 before CU9

item.title: CVE-2022-27518|2024-08-03T05:32:59.829Z -- citrix -- citrix%20gateway%2C%20citrix%20adc
item.description: Unauthenticated remote arbitrary code execution

item.title: CVE-2022-26355|2024-08-03T05:03:32.904Z -- citrix -- federated%20authentication%20service%20%28fas%29
item.description: Citrix Federated Authentication Service (FAS) 7.17 - 10.6 causes deployments that have been configured to store a registration authority certificate's private key in a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) to incorrectly store that key in the Microsoft Software Key Storage Provider (MSKSP). This issue only occurs if PowerShell was used when configuring FAS to store the registration authority certificate’s private key in the TPM. It does not occur if the TPM was not selected for use or if the FAS administration console was used for configuration.

item.title: CVE-2022-27512|2024-08-03T05:32:58.967Z -- citrix -- citrix%20application%20delivery%20management%20%28citrix%20adm%29
item.description: Temporary disruption of the ADM license service. The impact of this includes preventing new licenses from being issued or renewed by Citrix ADM.

item.title: CVE-2024-2049|2024-08-01T19:03:37.853Z -- citrix -- citrix%20sd-wan%20standard%2Fpremium%20editions
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in Citrix SD-WAN Standard/Premium Editions on or after 11.4.0 and before 11.4.4.46 allows an attacker to disclose limited information from the appliance via Access to management IP.

item.title: CVE-2024-6151|2024-07-18T03:55:19.557Z -- citrix -- windows%20virtual%20delivery%20agent
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Virtual Delivery Agent for Windows used by Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS

item.title: CVE-2024-6151|2024-07-12T20:06:00.319Z -- citrix -- windows%20virtual%20delivery%20agent
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Virtual Delivery Agent for Windows used by Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS

item.title: CVE-2024-6677|2024-07-12T02:41:17.327Z -- citrix -- uberagent
item.description: Privilege escalation in uberAgent

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-07-11T12:55:40.673Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-6149|2024-07-10T20:42:20.488Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Redirection of users to a vulnerable URL in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6148|2024-07-10T20:40:07.129Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Bypass of GACS Policy Configuration settings in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6150|2024-07-10T20:31:26.370Z -- citrix -- citrix%20provisioning
item.description: A non-admin user can cause short-term disruption in Target VM availability in Citrix Provisioning

item.title: CVE-2024-5661|2024-06-13T05:58:45.694Z -- citrix -- citrix%20hypervisor
item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.
